parse.title: Uglúk u bagronk sha pushdug Saruman-glob búbhosh skai

wikitext.*:
'''Uglúk u bagronk sha pushdug Saruman-glob búb-hosh skai''' is a phrase in [[Black Speech]], spoken by an unidentified [[Orcs|Uruk]] of [[Mordor]]. It was a phrase used to express a certain contempt in the handling of the prisoners [[Meriadoc Brandybuck|Merry]] and [[Peregrin Took|Pippin]], aimed at [[Uglúk]] and the Orcs of [[Isengard]].{{TT|Uruk}} ==Translation== The phrase is not translated in the text, and in Appendix F it is only identified as "''the more debased form [of Black Speech] used by the soldiers of [[Barad-dûr|the Dark Tower]]''".{{App|Other}} However, there exist three different translations of this sentence. ===First translation=== This translation appeared in the draft of Appendix F, published in ''[[The Peoples of Middle-earth]]''. Here, it is translated as "''Uglúk to the cesspool, sha! the dungfilth; the great Saruman-fool, skai!''"{{PM|II}}, note 6 ===Second translation=== In a second translation, published in an article by [[Carl F. Hostetter]] in [[Vinyar Tengwar 26|''Vinyar Tengwar'' 26]], the phrase reads "''Uglúk u bagronk sha pushdug Saruman-glob – búb-hosh skai!''", and the translation "''Uglúk to the dung-pit with stinking Saruman-filth - pig-guts, gah!''". Hostetter identifies the speaker as Grishnákh.[[Carl F. Hostetter]], ''"Uglúk to the Dung-pit"'', in [[Vinyar Tengwar 26|''Vinyar Tengwar'' 26]], p. 16 ===Third translation=== Yet another translation, published in [[Parma Eldalamberon 17|''Parma Eldalamberon'' 17]], is from the late 1950s, and as far as is known, Tolkien's last word on the subject. Here, the sentence is divided into one long sentence and one shorter - only expressing more contempt.{{PE|17}}, p. 78
:"''[Ugluk] u bagronk sha pushdug Saruman-glob.''
''búbhosh - skai!''" Which is translated as:
:"''Uglúk to torture (chamber) with stinking Saruman-filth.''
''Dung-heap. Skai!''". {{references}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Ugluk u bagronk sha pushdug Saruman-glob bubhosh skai}} [[Category:Orkish words]] [[Category:Black Speech words]] [[fi:Uglúk u bagronk sha pushdug Saruman-glob búbhosh skai]]
